name: Let it bee!
description:
Let it bee! My First Game Jam Winter 2022 Theme: Nature 🍁 Help the bees find their path! Controls: Click and drag on bee to create a bee path. Press 'P' to pause  Press 'R' to restart (on menu)  Instructions: 1. Click and drag to create a path for each bee 2. Fulfill its flower tasks 3. Go to the hive! Pro Tip: You can make just one path to fulfill all the bee's needs

All the contents of this game are created by Lockhead or are under the Creative Commons 0 License.
